description:
WHAT YOU WILL LEARN IN A NUTSHELL

The Amazon Bestseller Course teaches you how to:

  • Set up your Amazon book page for success
  • Rank well within Amazon search
  • Use Amazon book promotions
  • Get maximum exposure by using selected book promotion services
  • Select the right keywords and categories within the Amazon system
  • Time Amazon Bestseller attacks perfectly
  • Get the maximum out of your Amazon Bestseller status
  • And much much more!
title: How To Become A Bestselling Author On Amazon  | 2016
